c74object.name: cage.sdif.ptrack.resolve
c74object.digest: Resolve parameters of a partial tracking SDIF analysis
c74object.description: Outputs the partial-wise parameters of a partial tracking SDIF analysis

inlet.description: The SDIF analysis containing partial tracking information, as the one output by bach.readsdif.

outlet.description: See llll method to know more about output syntax.

method.name: bang
method.description: Output the information obtained from the most recently input analysis llll.

method.name: llll
method.description: An llll is expected to contain the llll form of a partial tracking SDIF analysis (as the one output by bach.readsdif). Then, from the second outlet the stream-wise and partial-wise content of the partial tracking is output, structured i.e. with an llll for each stream, and then an llll for each partial, containing in turn an llll for each peak inside the partial, containing onset, frequency, amplitude and phase. Finally, the stream IDs are output, as a plain list, from the first outlet.

attribute.name: noteoff
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to add note-off information for each partial as last peak. The amplitude of this padded peak will be the amplitude of the previous one in the same partial, and the phase will be extrapolated based on the frame position and partial frequency. If this attribute is active, each partial will then have a final peak having as onset the partial note-off onset. Default is 0 (off).

attribute.name: renumber
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to automatically renumber indices of partials which have the same index but are separated by some frames where such partial isn't present. Defaults to 0.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: SDIF analysis as llll. The SDIF analysis containing partial tracking information, as the one output by bach.readsdif.

entry.name: Outlet 2 (llll)
entry.description: Partials. See llll method to know more about output syntax.
